pr_title: Guard against timeout value that is too high and will cause overflow.

timeline.message: Guard against timeout value that is too high and will cause overflow.

timeline.bodyText: maybe this should be changed to float semantics, as in min is the smallest positive duration
timeline.author: havardpe

replies.bodyText: This is std::chrono::duration::min/max, so not up to us.
replies.author: baldersheim
